job_tasks.phrase: Je draagt bij aan de ontwikkeling van moderne, schaalbare en onderhoudsvriendelijke data-infrastructuren die onze klanten helpen bij het realiseren van hun datagedreven doelstellingen
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core software engineering task of building and maintaining scalable and maintainable data infrastructures, which aligns with the definition of developing and deploying software applications.

job_tasks.phrase: zet jij de standaard voor het inrichten van toekomstgerichte dataplatforms en zorg je voor een solide, betrouwbare basis voor het leveren van dataproducten.
job_tasks.justification: This describes setting standards for data platforms and ensuring a reliable foundation for data products, which falls under the umbrella of robust software engineering practices.

job_tasks.phrase: Het modelleren en structureren van data.
job_tasks.justification: This directly relates to the preparation and management of data for use, fitting the definition of data engineering and management.

job_tasks.phrase: Ontwikkelen van schaalbare en onderhoudsvriendelijke data pipelines die data uit onder andere REST API's en SQL-databases beschikbaar maken in data warehouses en daarmee dataproducten mogelijk maken.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the development of data pipelines to make data available in data warehouses, which is a core task in data engineering and management.

job_tasks.phrase: Implementeren van data warehousing en data lakes, waaronder het verzorgen van geautomatiseerde data migraties.
job_tasks.justification: Implementing data warehousing and data lakes, including automated data migrations, is a direct responsibility within data engineering and management.

job_tasks.phrase: Inrichten van cloud infrastructuur op basis van IaC (infrastructure as code, bijvoorbeeld in Bicep of Terraform).
job_tasks.justification: Setting up cloud infrastructure using Infrastructure as Code (IaC) falls under the operations and MLOps category, as it involves managing and automating infrastructure for data systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Analyseren van de bestaande dataplatforms en op basis daarvan voorstellen doen voor structurele verbeteringen.
job_tasks.justification: Analyzing existing data platforms and proposing improvements is a key aspect of data engineering and management, focusing on optimizing data infrastructure.

job_tasks.phrase: Up-to-date blijven en delen van kennis omtrent de nieuwste trends en technologieën op het gebied van data en AI.
job_tasks.justification: While this involves learning, the context of applying this knowledge to data and AI strategies for customers aligns with understanding business needs and aligning technical solutions.

soft_skills.phrase: Bij Delta-N krijg je de kans om te werken in een veelzijdig team met Data Scientists, Data Analisten, Software Engineers en DevOps consultants. Als Data Engineer speel je een cruciale verbindende rol binnen ons team.
soft_skills.justification: This highlights the collaborative nature of the role and the importance of connecting different technical disciplines within a team.

soft_skills.phrase: Up-to-date blijven en delen van kennis omtrent de nieuwste trends en technologieën op het gebied van data en AI.
soft_skills.justification: This explicitly states the need to stay updated with the latest trends and technologies in data and AI, which is a core aspect of learning and adaptability in a fast-evolving field.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement focuses heavily on core software engineering tasks related to building and maintaining data infrastructure, data pipelines, and data platforms (Macro-Category A). While it mentions 'AI team' and 'trends and technologies in data and AI', the specific tasks described (modeling, structuring data, developing pipelines, data warehousing, IaC, analyzing platforms) fall under Data Engineering & Management (1.B.3) and Software Development & Integration (1.A.1) and Operations & MLOps (1.A.2). There are no explicit tasks related to developing, fine-tuning, or prompting generative AI models (Macro-Category B). Therefore, the role is best classified as an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer, as it involves building the foundational data systems that support AI initiatives, rather than directly working with AI models themselves.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is quite clear about the responsibilities, which are primarily focused on data engineering and infrastructure. The mention of 'AI team' and 'data and AI trends' is present but not detailed enough to suggest a deep involvement in AI model development or GenAI specialization. The classification leans towards AI-Adjacent Software Engineer due to the strong emphasis on data infrastructure supporting AI, rather than direct AI model work. A score of 4 reflects this clarity with a slight ambiguity on the depth of AI involvement.
